message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $900000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $1000000. Would you consider lowering the price to meet my budget?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $950000. It's a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value and rarity. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still aiming to keep my spending below $1000000. Could you consider reducing the price further perhaps to $925000?

I understand you're still looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll meet you at $925000, but I'll throw in some additional perks to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium warranty and a personalized consultation to ensure you get the most out of the product. I think this is a great opportunity for you to get an amazing deal. What do you think?
